feed.title: BIP Proposal: Consensus (hard fork) PoST Datastore for Energy Efficient Mining

entry.title: BIP Proposal: Consensus (hard fork) PoST Datastore for Energy Efficient Mining
entry.summary: The email thread involves a discussion regarding the use of a better cryptography layer to improve hashing for validation and proposal of a document. The conversation is not related to the energy-efficient argument for renewables or mining devices. The email also includes a link to a paper which suggests that the mining market tends to expend resources equivalent to miner reward, without proving that energy expenditure is the primary cost. While some argue that negative externalities will arise due to energy expenditure, others believe that the move towards renewable energy will mitigate this issue.
